title: Way of the Samurai 4 Cracked - 3DM - updated to v1.04
description:
This is the 3DM release, I already applied their updates up to v1.04.
Now the 3DM release is just the game folder with no installation required.
I was having issues uploading the torrent due to the file types and the amount of files & folder as is so I wrapped it in an ISO to get around that.
Simply mount or extract the ISO.


1. Mount or extract the ISO file.
2. Copy Way of the Samurai 4 folder to C:Program Files
3. Now from within C:Program FilesWay of the Samurai 4 | copy WayOfTheSamurai4.exe
4. Go to your desktop, right click and paste shortcut, then rename it to Way of the Samurai 4
5. Go to C:ProgramDataMicrosoftWindowsStart MenuPrograms | and drag the shortcut from the desktop and into that folder.
6. Go back to your desktop, paste shortcut again and rename it.

Now it looks just like a normal install with desktop and start menu shortcuts
